book.title: The Minds of Billy Milligan
book.author: Daniel Keyes
book.description: A portrait of a tortured young man, arrested for a series of kidnappings and rapes, explores the world of a multiple personality, whose traumatic childhood shattered his mind into twenty-four distinct personalities.

book.title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
book.author: Oscar Wilde
book.description: In this celebrated work, his only novel, Wilde forged a devastating portrait of the effects of evil and debauchery on a young aesthete in late-19th-century England.
